data.title: Educating Rita by John Shuttleworth
data.meta_description:
Hairdresser Rita feels that life is passing her by. She wants an education. But does Frank have anything to teach her Willy Russells play gives a hilarious  and often moving  account of a young womans determination to change her life.

Product Description

Hairdresser Rita feels that life is passing her by. She wants an education. But does Frank have anything to teach her Willy Russells play gives a hilarious and often moving account of a young womans determination to change her life.
